 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסַל‎</span> **verb** ==hew, hew into shape== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***hew off*** boughs; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּסַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Biblical Hebrew; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פסלא‎</span> ***stone-cutter***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּסָלוֺ‎</span> [[Hab.2.18|Hab 2:18]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְסֹל‎</span> [[Exod.34.4|Exod 34:4]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֲּסָלֿ‎</span> [[Exod.34.1|Exod 34:1]]; [[Deut.10.1|Deut 10:1]] — ***hew out*** stone tablets [[Exod.34.1|Exod 34:1]]; [[Exod.34.4|Exod 34:4]]; [[Deut.10.1|Deut 10:1]]; [[Deut.10.3|Deut 10:3]] building-stones [[1Kgs.5.32|1Kgs 5:32]] with cognate accusative (suffix referring to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּסֶל‎</span>) [[Hab.2.18|Hab 2:18]].
